Title: establishes a hotel/motel occupancy tax for the village of West Hampton Dunes
Summary: Establishes a hotel/motel occupancy tax for the village of West Hampton Dunes, in the county of Suffolk.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the imposition of a hotel and motel tax in the village of West Hampton Dunes; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
